name: 505 Games
info:
• 简体中文名: 505游戏
  • 别名: 505 Games Ltd.
  • 引用来源: http://www.505games.com/
detail: 505 Games Ltd. is a global publisher of video games founded in 2006, and is a subsidiary of Italian company Digital Bros. S.p.A. The company publishes games globally for leading platforms along with console and handheld systems from Sony, Nintendo, and Microsoft, as well as for mobile devices and social networks. 505 Games headquarters is located in the city of Milan, Italy. The company also maintains divisions in Milton Keynes, United Kingdom; Los Angeles, United States; Lyon, France; Munich, Germany; Madrid, Spain and a network of distribution partners.

works.name: Journey to the Savage Planet / 野蛮星球之旅
Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night / 血污：夜之仪式
